description:
The ultimate showdown between Yusuke and Toguro finally begins, and Urameshi reveals the power he inherited from Genkai with a colossal blast of his Spirit Gun. Is it enough to bring down Toguro once and for all?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shukumei no Taiketsu! Arashi no Taishousen Kaishi
Yusuke contra Toguro. Începe lupta finală
宿命の対決! 嵐の大将戦開始
